personalInformation.summary: My objective is to obtain and secure a meaningful position integrating my skills with the expertise of my co-workers, resulting in a successful service provided to the client. Additionally, I am eager to gain knowledge through my own hard work and the tutelage of my superiors to earn advancement within the organization.
